means: 丧生( perish的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: His father, also a top-ranking officer, had perished during the war.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的父亲，也是位高级军官，在战争中牺牲了。

sentence.Network_en: I was perished. No jacket, no torch, wet through, exhausted.
sentence.Network_cn: 我快冻僵了。没有外衣，没有火把，浑身湿透了，筋疲力尽。

sentence.Network_en: Obviously the plaster's just perished and all fallen off.
sentence.Network_cn: 很明显灰泥已脆裂老化，全剥落下来了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: hundreds of people perished in the earthquake ., 数百人死于那次地震.

people used to think that when there was an earthquake , ground opened , swallowed great numbers of people , then closed , leaving no trace of those who perished .人们过去认为，当某个地方发生了地震，即大地裂开，吞下大量的人，然后又合上，人们被不留痕迹地毁灭。
A personal claim perished on the death of a party ., 个人诉讼请求因为当事人死亡而终止.
we would have perished without you ., 没有你我们将在劫难逃.

list.abs: periscope 潜望镜；一种照相用透镜perishable articles 易变质物品perisphere 外围层
航海及海运专业术语P(3) ... perish 腐烂死亡 perishable carrier 易腐货物运输船 perishable freight 易腐货物运费.
periscopic sight 潜望瞄准镜perished steel 过渗碳钢perisoxal 哌立索唑
perishable freight 易腐货物perishable freight 易腐货物运费Perishable Goods Clause 易腐货物条款

entry.def: If someone is perished, they are extremely cold.

example.ex: I was perished. No jacket, no torch, wet through, exhausted.
example.tran: 我快冻僵了。没有外衣，没有火把，浑身湿透了，筋疲力尽。

auth_sentence.content: Family members read names of loved ones who perished.
auth_sentence.res_content: Family members read names of loved ones who perished.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Family members read names of loved ones who perished.

auth_sentence.content: Other infants had already perished from lack of care.
auth_sentence.res_content: Other infants had already perished from lack of care.

auth_sentence.content: Why didn't we deflower him before he perished?
